scripts.@codercooks:dev: concurrently "pnpm @ui-react run build && pnpm @codercooks run dev" "pnpm @ui-react run build:watch" --names codercooks,ui-react
scripts.@kratos:dev: nodemon --exec "pnpm @ui-react run build && pnpm @kratos-web run dev" --watch ./packages/ui-react/src -e ts,tsx
scripts.@www:deploy: pnpm @react-resume run build && pnpm @ui-react run build && pnpm @www run build
scripts.@www:dev: concurrently "pnpm @ui-react run build && pnpm @www run dev" "pnpm @ui-react run build:watch" --names www,ui-react
scripts.check: pnpm run check:lint && pnpm run check:types && pnpm run test
